scripts.build:dev:darwin:linux: pnpm cleanup && pnpm manifests:copy && pnpm manifests:update && pnpm manifests:bundle && pnpm resources:copy
scripts.manifests:bundle: . ./node_modules/@osl/redhat-python-venv/venv/bin/activate && make -C ./generated PACKAGE_NAME="logic-operator-rhel8" VERSION="$(build-env oslOperatorBundleImage.version)" IMAGE_TAG="$(build-env oslOperatorBundleImage.operator.buildTag)" IMAGE_TAG_BASE=$(build-env oslOperatorBundleImage.operator.registry)/$(build-env oslOperatorBundleImage.operator.account)/$(build-env oslOperatorBundleImage.operator.name) bundle
scripts.manifests:copy: cp -R node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-operator/config generated/ && cp -R node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-operator/bundle generated/ && rm -rf generated/bundle/manifests/sonataflow-operator*.yaml && rm -rf generated/config/manifests/bases/*.yaml && cp -R resources/config generated/ && cp node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-operator/Makefile generated/ && cp -R node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-operator/hack generated/ && cp node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-operator/PROJECT generated/
scripts.resources:copy: cp -R resources/modules generated/ && cp resources/*.yaml generated/
